\DoxyCodeLine{00008\ \textcolor{keywordtype}{void}\ linear\_elastic(amrex::Real\ eps[NCOMP\_TENSOR],}
\DoxyCodeLine{00009\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ epsdot[NCOMP\_TENSOR],}
\DoxyCodeLine{00010\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ sigma[NCOMP\_TENSOR],}
\DoxyCodeLine{00011\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ E,\ amrex::Real\ v)}
\DoxyCodeLine{00012\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{00013\ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ trace\_eps=eps[XX]+eps[YY]+eps[ZZ];}
\DoxyCodeLine{00014\ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ const1=E/(one+v)/(one-\/two*v);}
\DoxyCodeLine{00015\ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ const2=E/(one+v);}
\DoxyCodeLine{00016\ }
\DoxyCodeLine{00017\ \ \ \ \ sigma[XX]=const1*((1-\/v)*eps[XX]\ +\ v*(eps[YY]+eps[ZZ]));}
\DoxyCodeLine{00018\ \ \ \ \ sigma[YY]=const1*((1-\/v)*eps[YY]\ +\ v*(eps[XX]+eps[ZZ]));}
\DoxyCodeLine{00019\ \ \ \ \ sigma[ZZ]=const1*((1-\/v)*eps[ZZ]\ +\ v*(eps[XX]+eps[YY]));}
\DoxyCodeLine{00020\ }
\DoxyCodeLine{00021\ \ \ \ \ sigma[XY]=const2*eps[XY];}
\DoxyCodeLine{00022\ \ \ \ \ sigma[XZ]=const2*eps[XZ];}
\DoxyCodeLine{00023\ \ \ \ \ sigma[YZ]=const2*eps[YZ];}
\DoxyCodeLine{00024\ \}}

\DoxyCodeLine{00031\ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ const1=E/(one+v)/(one-\/two*v);}

\DoxyCodeLine{00044\ \textcolor{keywordtype}{void}\ Newtonian\_Fluid(amrex::Real\ epsdot[NCOMP\_TENSOR],}
\DoxyCodeLine{00045\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ sigma[NCOMP\_TENSOR],}
\DoxyCodeLine{00046\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ dyn\_visc,}
\DoxyCodeLine{00047\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ pressure)}
\DoxyCodeLine{00048\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{00049\ }
\DoxyCodeLine{00050\ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ trace\_epsdot=epsdot[XX]+epsdot[YY]+epsdot[ZZ];}
\DoxyCodeLine{00051\ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ one\_by\_three=1.0/3.0;}
\DoxyCodeLine{00052\ }
\DoxyCodeLine{00053\ \ \ \ \ sigma[XX]=2.0*dyn\_visc*(epsdot[XX]-\/one\_by\_three*trace\_epsdot)-\/pressure;}
\DoxyCodeLine{00054\ \ \ \ \ sigma[YY]=2.0*dyn\_visc*(epsdot[YY]-\/one\_by\_three*trace\_epsdot)-\/pressure;}
\DoxyCodeLine{00055\ \ \ \ \ sigma[ZZ]=2.0*dyn\_visc*(epsdot[ZZ]-\/one\_by\_three*trace\_epsdot)-\/pressure;}
\DoxyCodeLine{00056\ }
\DoxyCodeLine{00057\ \ \ \ \ sigma[XY]=2.0*dyn\_visc*(epsdot[XY]);}
\DoxyCodeLine{00058\ \ \ \ \ sigma[XZ]=2.0*dyn\_visc*(epsdot[XZ]);}
\DoxyCodeLine{00059\ \ \ \ \ sigma[YZ]=2.0*dyn\_visc*(epsdot[YZ]);}
\DoxyCodeLine{00060\ }
